fields.name: Octane
fields.description: The Octane is the most popular car in Rocket League, known for its balanced hitbox and excellent turning radius. It's the go-to choice for many professional players.

fields.name: Dominus
fields.description: The Dominus features a flat, wide hitbox perfect for powerful flicks and precise ground shots. A favorite among freestylers.

fields.name: Fennec
fields.description: The Fennec uses the Octane hitbox but with a visual design that many players find easier for precise hits and dribbles.

fields.name: Mannfield
fields.special_features: Classic symmetrical design with clear boundaries and excellent visibility. The original Rocket League experience.

fields.name: Champions Field
fields.special_features: Official tournament arena with enhanced lighting and crowd effects. Home of RLCS championships.

fields.title: Initial Release
fields.description: The very first release of Rocket League, introducing the world to car soccer.
fields.major_changes: 8 cars, 10 arenas, local and online multiplayer, cross-platform play between PS4 and PC

fields.name: RLCS Season 1 World Championship
fields.highlights: The first ever RLCS World Championship that set the stage for Rocket League esports.
